There are several papers that discuss the validity of the Implicit Association Test. I want to discuss some of those claims, and see if we can still use this test in our analysis.

## [Vox article](https://www.vox.com/identities/2017/3/7/14637626/implicit-association-test-racism)

-   There is a lot of work that shows sweeping claims and large conclusions are debunked

-   But we can make Modest claims from the IAT
